metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24614 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Fossil before 2.10.2, 2.11.x before 2.11.2, and 2.12.x before 2.12.1 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code. An attacker must have check-in privileges on the repository.

criterions.comment: fossil: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
